title: [GAMEPLAY] Star Guardian Lulu's Polymorph returns "Cupcake" when pinged.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Star Guardian Lulu's Polymorph doesn't have a unique name (i.e.: Squill for Base, Dragon for DT) and instead uses the same as Bittersweet Lulu.  

It really doesn't look like a Cupcake.

replies.body:
Hey there! ^-^ 

Thanks for tossing this up on the boards - I had a busy morning and afternoon and didn't want to forget about dis! <3 I've gone ahead and logged this in the catalog, and see who would have time to tackle it. :) It'll be a lesser priority than some bugs (since it doesn't impact games), but it would be nice if we called the critter its name... which is Blob. :x

Thanks!  

We can now update the wiki with this all important info!
Okie! I tracked down a dev, and this was a super quick fix, so we did it! :D It'll be on PBE tomorrow, and hitting live next patch!
